content:
I am working on a new initiative to modernize the healthcare platform for Clinical Domain, we are planning to use HL7 FHIR for interoperability needs. I am looking for models for the below subject areas
Prior Auth
Health Assessments
Health Risk Identification
Care Management
Disease Management
Health & Wellness Initiative
Healthcare Measure
Medical Equipment
Medication
Plan of Care
Procedure
Physician Referral
Social History
Clinical Activity
Clinician
Clinical Program
Health Action
Health Assessment Conductor
Health Opportunity
Health Service Case
Health Tracker
Population Stratification
PCP Referral
Family History

Clinicians on FHIR

The Implementation Guide for Prior Authorization can be found at https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pas/spec.html The reference implementation (currently being developed) is open source at https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/prior-auth
